body:
Comment 2 by **clbanning**: 
That'd be fine if it worked for 8g on darwin rel. r58.  The attached program in
texec2.go produces NULL output when run as "./texec2 ls -l".  While the version in
texec.go yields the expected result when invoked as "./texec ls -l".
Attachments: 1. texec2.go (184 bytes) 1. texec.go (193 bytes)
